definition: Tricon Global Restaurants (incl. Pizza Hut and KFC)
pinyin: Bai3 sheng4 Can1 yin3 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Tricon Global Restaurants (incl. Pizza Hut and KFC)

sentences.english: In China, the Chinese enterprises are faced with the foreign brands catering enterprises to squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，中餐企业面临着外国品牌餐饮企业的挤压。

sentences.english: Treatment of restaurant wastewater with polysilicate aluminium was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以聚硅酸铝为混凝剂，用化学法絮凝处理餐饮废水。

sentences.english: The bar steward are accountable to the beverage manager .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧间服务员要对餐饮部经理负责。

sentences.english: Coffee retailer becomes latest food and beverage company to spread the wealth to investors.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡零售商最近成为散布投资者财富的餐饮公司。

sentences.english: Ensure that there is compliance with the work legislation in Food and Beverage departments.
sentences.chinese: 保证餐饮部的工作与相关要求一致。

sentences.english: Variations on the fast food restaurant concept include fast casual restaurants and catering trucks.
sentences.chinese: 变化的快餐店的概念包括快速休闲餐厅和餐饮车。

sentences.english: We also chose the uniform for F&B staff this week.
sentences.chinese: 本周我们还对餐饮部人员的服装进行了选样。

sentences.english: The American way of dining is such a large plate, and one should concentrate on the plate from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 美式餐饮就是那么一大盘，自始至终以一盘贯之。

sentences.english: The shopping and dining areas are home to numerous world-famous brands and chefs.
sentences.chinese: 购物餐饮区域汇集了为数众多的世界级品牌和厨师。

sentences.english: We have a package for $ 135 that includes all transportation and food.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一种一百三十五美元的，包括所有交通和餐饮。

sentences.english: I'll contact the Food and Beverage Manager at once.
sentences.chinese: 我会立即与餐饮部经理联系。

sentences.english: Paris is a dream for restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎是餐饮业的梦想之地。

sentences.english: Engaged in hotel and catering business has been my dream for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 从事酒店餐饮事业是我多时的梦想。

sentences.english: Maintain F&B concepts and Mission standards concerning preparation & presentation.
sentences.chinese: 保持餐饮的概念及使命，关于备菜和呈送。

sentences.english: A meal at the Real Café Bernabéu Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 伯纳乌饭店皇家咖啡厅的一顿餐饮。

sentences.english: These cases offer experiences and lessons for building a native strong catering brand of Tongren.
sentences.chinese: 为建设铜仁本土强势餐饮品牌提供正反经验借鉴。

definition: the catering industry/the hotel and restaurant business
fresh produce and freshly prepared foods
to retail/to sell individually or in small quantities
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
